QuestData.Title: Safety Measures
QuestData.Description: The batteries I lost in the bog have really ticked off the wild creatures. It's going to be impossible to remove them without fighting through who knows what.$B$BIf you're up for it, why don't you 'take care' of any critters you come across? I don't want some giant beast stalking me back to the excavation site.$B$BI'll make it worth your while.
QuestData.RewardText: Now that's what I'm talking about. You're tough as nails.
